mapper.select: SELECT sku_id, sku_code, sum(pick_real_qty) as pick_real_qty FROM log_so_pick WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= create_time GROUP BY sku_id, sku_code ORDER BY pick_real_qty DESC limit 10

SELECT proc_time, loc_code, sku_code, sku_name, lot_number, wellen_no, pick_real_qty, wsp_name, wsu_name, sku_lot1, sku_lot4 FROM log_so_pick WHERE so_bill_id = #{soBillId} AND is_deleted = 0
ORDER BY create_time DESC
